caption.p: The mRNA expressions of IL-6 ( A), inflammatory cytokines including TNF-α, IL-1β, IL-5 and IL-8 ( B), Th2-specific cytokines including IL-4 and IL-13 ( C), and MMP-2 and MMP-9 ( D) in PM 10-exposed A549 lung epithelial cells. The experiments were carried out in triplicate measurements. Results are presented as mean ± standard error of the mean. ### p < 0.001 vs. non-treated cells; * p < 0.05, and *** p < 0.001 vs. PM 10-treated cells.
